front.title: Access Control MIB for Version 2 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv2)

abstract.t: This document describes and defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with the Simple Network Management Protocol version 2. In particular, it defines objects for specifying access to data and protocol operations for specified security entities. The method of applying access control is dependent on the security model in use, but the specification of access policy is security model independent.
